bibl.title: School and Documentary Texts from Kharga Oasis at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York
bibl.note: Six texts on ostraka and wood in the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York (Department of Medieval Art), most probably found in the course of the expedition sponsored by the Museum in the Kharga Oasis (from 1909 to 1939 with various interruptions). - 1. T. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. X.608.1. School text. Kharga Oasis, III-IV AD. - 2. O. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. X.608.3. Receipt. Kysis (?), IV-V AD. - 3. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.5. Order for payment in barley. Kharga Oasis, IV-V AD. - 4. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.7. Order for payment in oil. Kharga Oasis, IV-V AD. - 5. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.6. Account of bricks. Kharga Oasis, IV-V AD. - 6. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.8. Note of a name. Kharga Oasis, III-IV AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 142.4 O. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. X.608.3; X.608.5; X.608.6; X.608.7; X.608.8 143.4 T. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. X.608.1
Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, School and Documentary Texts from Kharga Oasis at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.

Six texts on ostraka and wood in the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York (Department of Medieval Art), most probably found in the course of the expedition sponsored by the Museum in the Kharga Oasis (from 1909 to 1939 with various interruptions). - 1. T. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. X.608.1. School text. Kharga Oasis, III-IV AD. - 2. O. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. X.608.3. Receipt. Kysis (?), IV-V AD. - 3. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.5. Order for payment in barley. Kharga Oasis, IV-V AD. - 4. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.7. Order for payment in oil. Kharga Oasis, IV-V AD. - 5. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.6. Account of bricks. Kharga Oasis, IV-V AD. - 6. Inv. MMA acc. X.608.8. Note of a name. Kharga Oasis, III-IV AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
